title: The Woman in the Woods and Other North American Stories
description: Tricksters? Rabbits? Rougarou?Shapeshifters so frightening you shouldn't speak their name? That's just the start of this collection of folklore from the Indigenous people of North America, retold in comic form.The fifth volume of the Cautionary Fables and Fairytales graphic anthology series is a thrilling, funny and totally unexpected take on stories spanning North America, with loads of traditional stories from Indigenous Nations such as the Ta√≠no, Navajo, Odawa, and more!
author: Kate Ashwin
